m_maxPayout.label: Payactive Max:
m_maxPayout.tooltip: The largest amount you can give in a payactive

m_excludeStreamer.label: Exclude streamer
m_excludeStreamer.tooltip: Exclude the streamer from the payactives

m_defaultCooldown.label: Default Cooldown (seconds)
m_defaultCooldown.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds till a payout happens with just !payactive.

m_notLivePayout.label: Do offline Payouts
m_notLivePayout.tooltip: Do offline payouts at random intervals.

m_notLiveMin.label: Min Cooldown (seconds)
m_notLiveMin.tooltip: Set the minimum timeout between starts of random payouts (3600 = 1 hour).

m_notLiveMax.label: Max Cooldown (seconds)
m_notLiveMax.tooltip: Set the maximum timeout between starts of random payouts (7200 = 2 hours).

m_notLivePoints.label: Points given out offline
m_notLivePoints.tooltip: Set the amount people get during the offline random payouts.

m_defaultMessage.value: Hey there, chatters, in 5 minutes everyone who has been active in the last 15 minutes will receive {0} {1}!
m_defaultMessage.label: !payactive reply
m_defaultMessage.tooltip: The reply when you use !payactive {0} = Points given, {1} = currencyname

m_secondsMessage.value: Hey there, chatters, in {2} seconds everyone who has been active in the last 15 minutes will receive {0} {1}!
m_secondsMessage.label: !payactive seconds reply
m_secondsMessage.tooltip: The reply when you use !payactive <amount> <seconds> {0} = Points given, {1} = currencyname, {2} = seconds

m_minutesMessage.value: Hey there, chatters, in {2} minutes everyone who has been active in the last 15 minutes will receive {0} {1}!
m_minutesMessage.label: !payactive minutes reply
m_minutesMessage.tooltip: The reply when you use !payactive <amount> <minutes>m {0} = Points given, {1} = currencyname, {2} = minutes

m_payMessage.label: Payout reply
m_payMessage.tooltip: The reply when the payout happens {0} = Points given, {1} = currencyname, {2} = comma-seperated list of viewers

m_manyEnd.value: ... and more then twitch can handle!
m_manyEnd.label: Large Payout ending
m_manyEnd.tooltip: The text-ending when the total message would be too long for twitch. It will cut off the names that are too many and replace it with this.

m_overPayout.value: {0}, I think you made a typo there, the max is {1}
m_overPayout.label: Over-payout warning
m_overPayout.tooltip: Warning displayed if someone does a payout larger then the maximum amount {0} = user {1} = Current Maximum

m_noPayout.value: Seems like there was no-one here to give these {0} {1} to, oh well, more for me!
m_noPayout.label: No-one to pay-out to
m_noPayout.tooltip: Notice when no-one was active in the time-frame {0} = Points that would have been given {1} = Currencyname

m_wrongParamters.value: {0}, I dont get what you mean with that
m_wrongParamters.label: Error message
m_wrongParamters.tooltip: When you make a mistake in the command {0} = user
